title: Homepage - January 2026 - Norwest Equity Partners
text: We champion companies to achieve enduring growth. We invest where we can make a difference We partner with leaders of business services, consumer, and industrial companies – often as their first institutional investor – to help turn vision into durable growth. Our strength lies in delivering practical, sometimes unexpected solutions that enable product innovation, footprint expansion, R&D acceleration, and the development of high-performance teams. We’re better together. We work with our companies to hand assemble a team of experts, leaders, mentors, and resources to help them realize their growth potential. We take our responsibility to our companies to heart. A proven framework to power growth. We believe our NEP Performance Engine™ identifies top initiatives and optimal timing for value creation strategies curated to your unique capabilities, culture, and goals. ²Represents activity related to the Norwest Equity Partners strategy since the inception ³As of 9/30/2025
